title: Ground News - FT: Apple 'goes to war' against the US and the European Union
text:
Summary by Globo The company is accused of violating anti-trust legislation and is under intense scrutiny by regulatory authorities in two of its main markets, the USA and the European Union Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
